scripts.seed:artists: ts-node -e "import('./src/seeds/artists.seed').then(({seedArtists}) => {const {PrismaClient} = require('@prisma/client'); const prisma = new PrismaClient(); seedArtists(prisma, 20).then(() => prisma.$disconnect());})"
scripts.seed:albums: ts-node -e "import('./src/seeds/albums.seed').then(({seedAlbums}) => {const {PrismaClient} = require('@prisma/client'); const prisma = new PrismaClient(); seedAlbums(prisma, 30).then(() => prisma.$disconnect());})"
